title: Substitution, income effect for ice cream demand

content.question: Assume that ice cream is a normal good. If the price of ice cream decreases, the substitution effect and the income effect will lead to which of the following changes in ice cream consumption?

choices.label:
Substitution Effect
 Income Effect

Increase
 Decrease

Substitution Effect
 Income Effect

Increase
 Increase

Substitution Effect
 Income Effect

Increase

No change

Substitution Effect
 Income Effect

Decrease
 Increase

Substitution Effect
 Income Effect

Decrease
 No change

content.answer:
Substitution Effect
 Income Effect

Increase
 Increase

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
